product_name: Shimano SM-MA-R160 Disc Brake Mount Adaptor - Rear
long_description: The Shimano SM-RA-R160 disc brake mount adaptor allows a 74mm rear post-type caliper to bolt to a chainstay with 51mm bolt width that takes a 160mm rotor. Works with standard hub; rear only.
short_description: The Shimano SM-RA-R160 disc brake mount adaptor allows a 74mm rear post-type caliper to bolt to a chainstay with 51mm bolt width that takes a 160mm rotor.
